dfply.select.select_if(df, fun)¶

Selects columns where fun(ction) is true Args:

fun: a function that will be applied to columns
dfply.select.drop_if(df, fun)¶

Drops columns where fun(ction) is true Args:

fun: a function that will be applied to columns
